description:
Get ready for BATTLE and experience Empire: Four Kingdoms now for FREE! Play the award-winning MIDDLE-AGES STRATEGY GAME and compete with MILLIONS of other players!

Play Empire: Four Kingdoms now and discover remote countries and continents. Rule your KINGDOM and build a mighty CASTLE. Protect your citizens, join a mighty ALLIANCE and arm yourself for attacks against countless rival players.

5/5 "An unbelievably good game!"
5/5 "Strategically challenging but still easy to pick up and play! I love it!"
5/5 "Finally I can go to war together with my friends!"

Build fortresses to last for eternity and unite with other players in powerful ALLIANCES. Conquer strategically important outposts and lay the foundations for a flourishing ECONOMY. Explore new continents and vie for supremacy in the kingdom with countless other players. Send your armies into battle and reduce your enemies' castles to rubble. Choose from a huge number of lethal WEAPONS for ATTACK and DEFENSE. Reign over a mighty EMPIRE and become a legend in the award-winning strategy MMO Empire: Four Kingdoms.

Install the hit strategy game from Goodgame Studios on your iPhone or iPad now.

√ Enjoy endless gaming fun for FREE
√ Over 15 MILLION PLAYERS are already playing
√ Collect resources and get your ECONOMY rolling
√ Form mighty ALLIANCES with other players and fight in epic battles against millions of other players
√ FOUR MASSIVE KINGDOMS with thrilling challenges are waiting for you
√ Plan STRATEGIC BATTLES with over 50 different units and loads of weapons
√ Tackle and overcome exciting EVENTS
√ Countless hours packed with suspense are in store for you - alone or with the COMMUNITY


Problems & Questions: http://support.goodgamestudios.com/?lang=en&g=16
Forum & Community: http://en.board.goodgamestudios.com/empirefourkingdoms/forum.php
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EmpireFourKingdoms
Terms & Conditions: http://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en.html

The game requires an internet connection.
releaseNotes:
NEW RESEARCH
Upgrade your research tower and improve your castle and troops!
Visit the researcher's camp for new discoveries!

MORE COMPETITION
Battle for valuable rewards in the new ranking for your level range!

NEW MARAUDER EVENT
Donate resources, collect points, and receive great rewards!

HIGHER ALLIANCE LEVEL
Climb all the way up to level 50 with your alliance!

PREMIUM SYSTEM
Stay a step ahead with exclusive bonuses!
